For example the shoulder of T7 (10). It seems like that the source information is wrong.

WorkItem.Summary: Seems like many items data in 2.2.14 are wrong.

Comments.Message: Please give exact examples where you see any parsing issues.

Take "Runed Ironhide Boots" for example. When I first opened rawr 2.2.14, it showed "Drops from in". Then I updated it from wowhead. It showed "Trash drop in Heroic Ulduar", which is correct.
As I have updated some of the items, I think at least 50 of them are wrong.

Well, Runed Ironhide Boots are not a trash drop (it drops from Iron Council), but I can see how Rawr might think that, since any item dropped by more than mob is considered a Trash Drop.
Please list as many of them as possible, just telling us that there's 50 wrong doesn't help.

I think providing a function like "update items' information" would be very helpful.
Update them one by one to see if the information is correct is hard....
Ha, I did not know it updated all the items.

aye there are quit a lot of items that are show twise in there. let's take a example of the gloves of silver assasin there is to kind of em in there where in the other has 2 soccet slots and higher stats and then there is the right one whit proper stats and only 1 soccet place.
There are really two versions. Heroic and non-heroic to be exact.
